add_company.header_info: After filling up the form, your request will be send to moderator, where will be verified.
add_company.description_info: Write about your company to help students with the decision.

forgot_password.header: Please fill email, we will send you a link to change your password
forgot_password.reset_confirm_header: Please enter new password twice to change it

verify_email.header: Before submitting your company, confirm your registration by clicking the link sent to the email address used during account registration.
verify_email.email_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

error.description_404: Could not find the requested page.
error.description_419: Sorry, your session has expired. Please, refresh and try again.
error.description_429: Please, try again in a moment.
error.description_500: Something is wrong on our end.
error.description_503: Can't access service at this time.

validation.unique: Specified email address is already in the database.

auth.failed: Wrong email address or password entered.

passwords.sent: A password reset link was sent to the email address you entered.
passwords.throttled: Password reset attempt too often. Please try again in a moment.
passwords.user: The specified email address does not exist in our database.
passwords.token: Token to change the password has expired, please create a new request.
